attributes.action: Boycott Turkish Goods and Tourism until Turkey, stops Killing the Kurdish people
attributes.background: Turkey has oppressed its own people for a long time. Because of the UK GOV`s mutual relationships and self interest. The mainstream media largely does not fully report on the situation. Turkey is currently killing its own innocent people, torture, prison, discrimination, Human Rights Violations.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking for individuals to boycott Turkey or to decide not to go on holiday there. If so, that would be a decision for individual citizens to take, not a decision for the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you would like the UK Government to work with other countries to impose sanctions on Turkey, you could start a petition about that.
